title.narrative: 2018 Mgmt Project - Public Opinion Research on Youth Perceptions of Employment

description.narrative: This pioneer research project seeks to provide the MasterCard Foundation with insights on youth career aspiration in order to guide the design of informed country level strategy aiming at creating meaningful employment for youth in the targeted countries. The project seeks to answer to a need identified by the MasterCard Foundation for public opinion research through a more representative view of the attitudes and aspirations of young people around: a) their career and work aspirations, b) the determinants of work/job satisfaction, c) Bridging employment preferences and job/work realities, barriers to self determination in working conditions.
